meta.title: Roxstein
meta.description: Tailored software and multimedia solutions designed to help your business thrive.
keywords: top web design agency in Switzerland

hero.tagline: Elevating your business success to the next level.
hero.description: When Swiss precision meets global talent, the result is websites that deliver – more visibility, more customers, and measurable growth.

services.title: Services
services.description: Every project we deliver is shaped by our clients’ vision and goals.

design.title: Design
design.description: We create websites that don’t just look beautiful, they work beautifully. Clear, intuitive, and purposeful. From sleek minimalist layouts to bold visual statements, every detail is crafted to guide your visitors effortlessly and make your brand unforgettable.

dev.title: Development
dev.description: Our development process ensures your website is technically flawless, cleanly coded, lightning-fast, and reliable across devices. Whether it’s CMS integration, custom features, or dynamic animations, we deliver solutions built for long-term performance and easy maintenance.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.description: Hosting with care. We keep your site running smoothly, securely, and without interruptions, just as it should.

why.title: Why Choose Roxstein?
why.tagline: Here’s how we accelerate your business growth.
why.description: With Roxstein, your ideas move from concept to reality faster, turning

reason3.title: Creative Excellence
reason3.description: At Roxstein, creativity meets precision. We blend innovative design with strategic thinking to create digital experiences that reflect your brand with clarity and authenticity, design with purpose.

reason4.title: Quality Without Compromise
reason4.description: Every site we deliver is rigorously tested on every device, in every major browser. Performance, security, and usability are checked down to the last detail to guarantee reliable results.

value.title: Value
value.tagline: More Impact. More Results. More Than Just a Website.
value.description: For us, it’s not just about creating a website, it’s about delivering measurable business impact. Our solutions streamline operations, enhance flexibility, and deliver digital results that push your business forward. Our goal? To ensure your investment doesn’t just pay for itself, it pays you back.
value.descriptionMobile: We build solutions that drive success with faster workflows, deeper insights, and higher conversion rates.

secondCta.title: Questions? Speak Directly With Our Team

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.tagline: Meet Roxstein and the people behind it.

years.title: Years in Business
years.description: Roxstein has been in business for over three years, but our expertise goes much further back. We’re a team of seasoned professionals with deep experience in design, development, and digital strategy.

clients.title: Happy Clients
clients.description: Driving brand growth through innovative, high-performing solutions.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: At Roxstein, our work is guided by clear principles that shape everything we do delivering real, lasting value for our clients.

team.title: The Team
team.description: An international team of experts with diverse skills and perspectives, united by a passion for creating digital excellence.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.tagline: We value transparency and compliance with legal regulations
